l2itemselector.configuration.infoAlpha.t:
Background transparency for info text box overlay. 1 means opaque.
Range: 0.0 ~ 1.0
l2itemselector.configuration.infoMaxWidt:
Max width for info box. 0.5 means half screen. default: 0.3
Range: 0.0 ~ 0.5
l2itemselector.configuration.selectionDi: Render selector only when pressing [Hold Selection]
l2itemselector.configuration.selectionSc: Scroll for selection only when pressing [Hold Selection]
l2itemselector.configuration.title: L2 Item Selector Configuration
l2itemselector.title: L2 Item Selector
